page.title: 09LANGUAGE IN STANLEY cont.
page.content:
E.G."Where's he at?";"Where is he?"; ?";"What did you do that for?";"Why did he do that?". Sentences often end in prepositions and the voice rises as the end of the sentence is reached. The perfect tense is not really well grasped."Where's he went?" means "Where has he gone?"
"One neet a man was drivin alang a lonely road at the borrum of a hill,when his car brok doon.The anly quick way yem was tu cross ower the hill.When he got to the top o the bank,he was surrounded be coos,he waaked on and th' nicked off"
